maqras.text: 76|19|yeongsaeng-ui eolin-ideul-i geudeul saileul doni geudaega geudeul-eul boass-eul ttaeneun geudeul-eul heut-eojin jinjuallo saeng-gaghal geos-imyeo
76|20|geugos-eseo jeongnyeong geudaega bol geos-eun anlaghamgwa widaehan jugwon-ila

76|21|geudeul wie geolchyeojin geos-eun budeuleoun nogsaeg bidan osgwa dutumhan myeongjubut-iimyeo geudeul-eun eun-eulo doen paljjilo chijangdoel geos-ila. geuligo geudeul junimkkeseoneun geudeul-ege cheongjeonghan eumlyoleul jusil geos-ila
76|22|“sillo igeos-eun geudaedeul-eul wihan bosang-euloseo geudaedeul-ui nolyeog-eun bodabbad-assnola”
76|23|jinsillo naneun geudaeege kkulan-eul dangyejeog-eulo naelyeossnola
76|24|geuleoni geudaeneun geudae junim-ui pangyeol-e innaehago geudeul jung-e joejisneun jana bulsinhaneun jaleul ttaleuji malla
76|25|geuligo ileun najgwa neuj-eun naj-e geudae junim-ui ileum-eul tteoollimyeo
76|26|bamjung-eneun geubun-eul wihae buboghago bam-ui olaen sigan-e geubun-eul chan-yanghala
76|27|sillo ideul-eun hyeonseleul salanghamyeo mugeoun nal-eul dwilo naebeolyeodudeola
76|28|sillo naega geudeul-eul changjohayeossgo geudeul-ui golgyeog-eul ganghage hayeossnola. naega wonhaessdamyeon geudeulgwa yusahan jadeullo jeongnyeonghi (geudeul-eul) daechehaess-eul geos-ila
76|29|sillo igeos-eun tteoollim-ila. geuleoni wonhaneun janeun geuui junimkkelo hyanghaneun gil-eul jab-eula
76|30|geudaedeul-i wonham-eun ojig hananimkkeseo wonhasigi ttaemun-ila. sillo hananimkkeseoneun asineun bun-imyeo jihyelousin bun-idoda
76|31|geubunkkeseoneun wonhasineun jaleul dangsin-ui jabi sog-e deulge hasinola. geuligo budanghan jadeul, geudeul-eul wihae geubunkkeseoneun gotongseuleon beol-eul junbihasyeossnola
77|1|malgalgicheoleom mol-achineun balam-eul dugo maengseko
77|2|maenglyeolhi buneun geosen balam-eul dugo maengseko
77|3|guleum-eul peotteulineun balam-eul dugo maengseko
77|4|jinlileul bunbyeolhaneun cheonsaleul dugo maengseko
77|5|mesijileul gyesihaneun cheonsaleul dugo maengseko
77|6|(geu mesijineun) byeonlon-igeona gyeong-goloseo
77|7|jinsillo geudaedeul-i yagsogbad-eun geos-eun dagchyeool geos-ila
77|8|geuleoni byeoldeul-ui bich-i jiwojigo
77|9|haneul-i gallajigo
77|10|san-i ppobhyeo nagago
77|11|sadodeul-i jijeongdoen sigan-e moil ttae
77|12|geudeul-ui gihan-eun eotteon nal-eul wihae jijeongdoen geos-inga
77|13|bunliui nal-eul wihaeseola
77|14|mueos-i geudaeege bunliui nal-i mueos-injileul allyeo jul geos-inga
77|15|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|16|naega ijeon salamdeul-eul pamyeolsikiji anh-assdeonga
77|17|geu hu naneun ihu salamdeul-i geudeul-eul dwittaleudolog hayeossnola
77|18|geuleohge naneun aghaeng-eul jeojileuneun jadeul-eul dalunola
77|19|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|20|naega bicheonhan mullobuteo geudaedeul-eul changjohaji anh-assdeonga
77|21|geu hu naneun geugeos-eul hwaggohan jeongchagjie dueoss-euni
77|22|iljeonghan gigankkajila
77|23|geuleohge naega jojeolhayeoss-euni eolmana hullyunghi jojeolhaneun jainga
77|24|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|25|naega daejileul geuleus-eulo duji anh-assdeonga
77|26|sal-aissneun jadeulgwa jug-eun jadeul-eul wiham-ila
77|27|geuligo naneun geugos(daeji)e uttug sos-eun dandanhan san-eul dueossgo geudaedeul-i dalkomhan mul-eul masidolog hayeossnola
77|28|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|29|“geudaedeul-i bujeonghadeon geos-eul hyanghae gil-eul tteonala”
77|30|“se gaeui deong-eolilo doen eodum-eul hyanghae gil-eul tteonala”
77|31|(geu eodum-eneun) geuneuldo eobsgo bulgil-eul mag-ajujido anhnola
77|32|sillo geugeos(jiog)eun seongluwado gat-eun bulkkochdeul-eul naebaet-euni
77|33|geugeos(bulkkoch)eun machi hwangsaeg-ui nagtadeulgwa gatdeola
77|34|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|35|i nal-eun geudeul-i mal-eul haji moshaneun nal-imyeo
77|36|geudeul-ege byeonmyeonghal gihoedo heolagdoeji anh-eul geos-ila
77|37|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|38|i nal-eun bunliui nalloseo naega geudaedeulgwa ijeon salamdeul-eul moassnola
77|39|geuleoni geudaedeul-ege gyelyag-i issdamyeon na-ege gyelyag-eul kkumyeo bola
77|40|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|41|sillo (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-eun geuneulgwa umul gyeot-e iss-eul geos-imyeo
77|42|geudeul-i meoggo sip-eohaneun gwaildo iss-eul geos-ila
77|43|“geudaedeul-eun swii meoggo masila, geudaedeul-i haenghadeon geos-e daehan daegala”
77|44|sillo naneun choeseon-eul dahaneun jadeul-eul geuleohge bosanghanola
77|45|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|46|“eolmagan meoggo jeulgila, sillo geudaedeul-eun aghaeng-eul jeojileuneun jadeul-ila”
77|47|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|48|geudeul-ege “heolisug-yeo jeolhasio” laneun mogsoliga deullil ttae geudeul-eun heolisug-yeo jeolhaji anhdeola
77|49|geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
77|50|geuleohdamyeon geudeul-eun geugeos(kkulan) ioee eotteon malsseum-eul midneundan mal-inga
